Texts.Eng: Bring a ^orange;Alien Broadcast Node^reset; to the ^green;Kirhosi Shop^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

I've heard that there is a rare component called a ^orange;Alien Broadcast Node^reset; that could be utilized for a truly great FTL drive just waiting to be found somewhere in the ^green;Evernight Jungle^reset;. It's a rumour, granted, but hypothetically, if you found one, I might have something for you...
You've no idea how much this means to me. As thanks for this most wonderous technology I bequeath to you another sort of rarity. May it bring you fortune in your travels.
